channel.title: Clan Chat Errors
channel.description:
Working on clan chat and I get these errors..
[code] src\server\world\ClanChatHandler.java:30: cannot find symbol symbol : method isClanOwner(server.model.players.Client) location: class server.world.ClanChatHandler if (isClanOwner(c)) { ^ src\server\world\ClanChatHandler.java:33: cannot find symbol symbol : method isClanRanked(server.model.players.Client) location: class server.world.ClanChatHandler } else if (isClanRanked(c)) { ^ Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 2 errors Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
I've added
public boolean ClanRanked; public boolean ClanOwner;
Idk didn't work :\

item.title: Clan Chat Errors
item.dc:creator: @Kozs Kozs
item.description:
@Kozs wrote:

Working on clan chat and I get these errors…

src\server\world\ClanChatHandler.java:30: cannot find symbol symbol : method isClanOwner(server.model.players.Client) location: class server.world.ClanChatHandler if (isClanOwner(c)) { ^ src\server\world\ClanChatHandler.java:33: cannot find symbol symbol : method isClanRanked(server.model.players.Client) location: class server.world.ClanChatHandler } else if (isClanRanked(c)) { ^ Note: Some input files use unchecked or unsafe operations. Note: Recompile with -Xlint:unchecked for details. 2 errors Press any key to continue . . .

I’ve added

public boolean ClanRanked;
public boolean ClanOwner;

Idk didn’t work :\

Read full topic
